GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10.17 to before v5.10.44
GSD.description:
tracing: Correct the length check which causes memory corruption

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.44 by commit 43c32c22254b9328d7abb1c2b0f689dc67838e60, it was introduced in version v5.10.17 by commit 7c93d8cff582c459350d6f8906eea6e4cd60d959. For more details please see the references link.
